stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 50 or more cards in your deck. When your turn begins, you may shuffle 1 card from Archives into R&D. Errata from FAQ 3.1
text:
This card costs 0 influence if you have 50 or more cards in your deck.
When your turn begins, you may shuffle 1 card from Archives into R&D.
<errata>Errata from FAQ 3.1</errata>
title: Museum of History
